summary: At a farmhouse in the middle of nowhere, a hopeful hair-metal band seeking inspiration to record their upcoming new LP will soon find themselves in a furious confrontation against the Prince of Darkness himself.
cast: Cindy Cirile|Jesse D'Angelo|Chris Finkel|Jon Mikl Thor|Jillian Peri|Adam Fried|Teresa Simpson|Frank Dietz|Liane Abel Dietz|Denise Dicandia|Jim Cirile|David Lane|Gene Kroth|Rusty Hamilton|Carrie Schiffler|Tralle O'Farrell|Lara Daans|Nancy Bush
title: Al filo del infierno
